title.en: Merched y Wawr Aberporth Branch celebrates one of their members' 100th Birthday
title.cy: Merched y Wawr Cangen Aberporth yn dathlu penblwydd un o’r aelodau yn 100 oed.

description.en:
Merched y Wawr Cangen Aberporth yn dathlu penblwydd un o’r aelodau, Eluned Harries, yn 100 oed.  
Rhes flaen – Deanna Hywel, Molly Thomas, Eluned Harries, Anne Rees, Blodwen Williams, Lilian Jones
Ail Res – Margaret Reed, Joyce Waters, Nellian Morgan, Elizabeth davies, Mary Bott, Anne Gomer Jones, Angela Rees
Cefn – Sally Jones, Bronwen Davies, Tegwen Gibby, Meriel Roper, Joyce Owen, Lynda Evans, June Lloyd Jones, Gwenda Vale, Menna Richards, Annita Williams, Margaret Stenner, Mair Thomas, Mari Owens
